events.question: *'Flub's Book of Good Things Found on Ground'' is open, care to read the passage?*

events.text:
Red Mushroom grow in bunches - good for eat and for making sciences.
Moss grow on dead trees. Good for eat and for nap.
Noogut Feather look pretty in hair but not good for eat.
Flub find more good things too but Flub find no reason to write them down...
